title: The WIS mesh data notification schema
description: Formal description of the messages send as notification about data/file availability.

pubTime.title: Publication time
pubTime.description: Time of ingestion into the mesh. ISO 8601.

baseUrl.title: Base URL of the service
baseUrl.description: URL pointing to the server that send this notification and where the data (file) is available. For historical reasons the URL is spelled 'Url'.

relPath.title: Relative path
relPath.description: Relative path identifies location of the file (relative to the base URL) but also can be considered as very brief metadata as the path is expected to contain standardised components such as name of producing organization.

retPath.title: Retrieval path
retPath.description: If the relPath cannot be used to construct a URL that unambiguously identifies the data instance, than this value can be used to override it. In other words, this can be a very ugly string that together with the baseUrl forms a URL that your web server understands, while the relPath is a nice and structured and standardised and human readable identifier.

integrity.title: Checksum or a digital signature of the file.

value.title: The Value Schema
value.description: Base 64 encoded checksum or digital signature

type.title: Fixed value
type.description: Type is needed for compatibility with GeoJSON, it is set to a fixed value

geometry.description: Geometry is needed for compatibility with GeoJSON, it is set to a fixed value

partitionStrategy.title: Partition strategy
partitionStrategy.description: Optional way of anouncing patrialy available files.

remainder.title: The size of the Lastblock Schema

content.title: Content (body) of the file
content.description: Optional way how to send the content of a file to optimize transfer of small files.
